lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: A small amount of money can make a big difference. A strong female presence strengthens the family and the village. I like to support women around the world so they can improve their lives and those of their family and village.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I can. And so should you.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: There are so many amazing people in the world who are less fortunate than we are. A little goes a long way. Give up that pair of jeans you wanted to buy and donate that money you would have used and donate it to someone who really needs it to sustain their lives and support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an occupational therapist. I help people who have been injured physically or mentally. I help them with their everyday tasks we sometimes take for granted.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: For my 7th birthday party I decided to ask my freinds to give a donation to Kiva instead of a gift. My friends and I do pay it forward birthdays and I really wanted to give to these people in need. (Sept 2007)
lenders.occupational_info: We have a family business that helps children learn the gift of giving.

lenders.name: Merlin
lenders.occupational_info: Onerous...

lenders.name: Gil
lenders.loan_because: I want to see everyone have an opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide water pump service for homes in our area. Everyone needs clean water.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: My dad and I do it together. It's a great way to help people and you don't lose any money. It's fun!

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I can and kiva makes it so easy to do something that makes a difference for someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I have about 15 people who work for me. We answer phones and answer questions about dental insurance.

lenders.name: Volatile Monkey
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I want to help us both prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at the university.

lenders.name: allison
lenders.loan_because: I am Connected.
lenders.occupational_info: Fulfilling

lenders.name: Zee
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if we all helped each other, the world would be a much better place.

lenders.name: Judi
lenders.loan_because: I work hard for my money and I love knowing that it continues to work hard for someone trying to make a difference in their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I deliver packages to businesses and residentials in central Oahu

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: To help and encourage people who wish to improve their lives and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with research to try to understand how the Universe began, what different things it is made of and how it has evolved. I also teach university students in physics.

lenders.name: elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, as others have helped me in times of need. You are inspiring.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with all different types of people.

lenders.name: Candy
lenders.loan_because: I have started up a small cottage industry, part-time, with hopes of it becoming a source of retirement income.  I know what I have accomplished to make it this far.  I want to pass on the sense of pride in creating a viable business, and help build the confidence that they can succees with the help of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children about creative thinking, teamwork and how to learn about the world through art.  They see me model it as I design and teach basket-making.

lenders.name: larry
lenders.loan_because: We are all better off in every way when we help others help themselves. Change one person and you change the world.

lenders.name: mzungu
lenders.loan_because: of love

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.occupation: Nurse massage therapist and designer, seamstress
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed in my life and I want to share my blessings with others.  When I got upsized out of my nursing job and the economy had a negative effect on my massage therapy job I was able to start a business called terirecycles with the help of my husband, I now sell off my website, terirecycles.com and at boutiques and street fairs.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide massage for peoples of all kinds, sick, dying and in good health with a few aches and pains.  I listen and provide healing touch.  My recycle business is about making things we all enjoy out of items we have either discarded or passed on.  It is about giving a new lease on life to a person or thing.  Doing anything with love and kindness makes the world go round!

lenders.name: Clara
lenders.loan_because: People reap what they sow.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: My experiences in developing countries are always in my heart, and have changed the way I think and act.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with low-income families living in public housing and coordinate programs to meet their various needs.

lenders.name: Bartholomew
lenders.loan_because: it is a small thing that can be very big, and it's something I can do right now.

lenders.name: Cleo
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky to have the life that I have and I want to give others the chance to have a great life too.

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.loan_because: I know my modest contribution will make a difference and through Kiva I feel like I'm part of the solution for a change.  Bravo to the founders and all who are making it work!
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from a job with a non-profit company that helps people achieve home ownership.  It is called Options for Homes and was started in Toronto, Canada.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because:
Because I believe that grassroots work is incredibly significant work.  Because there are mamas and babas all over the world who want a good future for their children.  Because the world is full of people containing all things good yet lacking in resources.  Because it is fun.  Because I miss international work and this is a way to be involved.  Because I can.

... And here is a shout out to RPCV's too. :) (Kenya 01-03)
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to talk to children and parents to ensure that kids are not being abused or neglected and are safe to live in their homes.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed!
lenders.occupational_info: I interview people and write articles about their lives.

lenders.name: Lou
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I help to develop software that is used in hospitals.

lenders.name: SHANIL C.

lenders.name: Mary Anne
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed, and I would like to share
lenders.occupational_info: I taught history to 16 year olds and loved it.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to give back to the world and help people get started in business.
lenders.occupational_info: I support computer systems to run business processes and find ways to solve business problems. My wife has started her own business from scratch and understands the challenges of getting started.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because:
It is such a fabulous way to make a difference.  As a small business owner myself I respect people who are looking for ways to improve their businesses and be self sufficient.  I appreciate having the opportunity to see the people wo are looking for loans and hear about their plans.  

I enjoy sewing, gardening, cooking, and farmers markets so these types of businesses will be the ones most likely to catch my eye.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies make sure that the medical devices they design and manufacture are safe and effective.  I do this by developing and delivering training classes for their employees, by performing audits of their business practices, by helping them design or improve business systems.  I've been in the industry for 32 years and am proud that our industry makes products that improve people's lives.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that collectively individuals can help to make a global impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help make the internet a safer place by fighting cybercrime.

lenders.name: Tai
lenders.loan_because: I love to help those whose know how to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring truck load of products, goods and supplies materials etc... to companies and market distribution center nation wide or disaster area such as the city of New Orleans, LA and Gulfport, MS during Hurricane Katrina period.

lenders.name: Celiene
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It brings me great joy!

lenders.name: Felicia
lenders.loan_because: At some point in time in our lives we all need help.  It is an awesome responsibility to be a great steward over the finances with which God entrusts us.  I am grateful to be in a position to help someone us to fulfill their goals and their dreams.

lenders.name: Sridhar
lenders.loan_because: want to keep in touch with the world
lenders.occupational_info: i like the work whatever i am doing here.

lenders.name: Wendie
lenders.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live the way I do and just would like to help others.  There was a time when my family didn't have all we needed and I remember how hard it was.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an EMT and work on an emergency ambulance. I am also a registered nurse and work part time in the emergency room of the only hospital on our island.

lenders.name: DEBI
lenders.loan_because: I AM ALWAYS  GRATEFUL TO BE ABLE TO SHARE MY BLESSINGS WITH OTHERS BECAUSE I KNOW WHEN WE GIVE TO ONE ANOTHER IN ANY FORM WE ARE ALWAYS GIFTED BACK DOUBLE HENCE WHAT BLESSES ONE BLESSES ALL.
lenders.occupational_info: I AM RESPONSIBLE FOR RUNNING THE OFFICE AND ALL THE PAPERWORK THAT IS REQUIRED FOR OUR COMMERCIAL PLUMBING BUSINESS.

lenders.name: Georgie
lenders.loan_because: I realise that for the small amounts that can be given, it can make a big difference in someones life, that not only impacts on that one individual but on their family and community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying at university, and also work part time at a supermarket

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: access to credit is essential if people in developing countries are to escape from cycles of poverty and marginalisation.

lenders.name: MaryAnn
lenders.loan_because: i loan here because i can help others reach independence and a better life for themselves and their families. i feel that by lending in this manner equips the individuals and keeps their dignity..its not just a handout, but a statement of my belief in them that i think they can do it, be a success...to rise above.
lenders.occupational_info: follower of Jesus Christ, wife, mother of two wonderful young adults, grandma to a couple amazingly beautiful children, community volunteer, children's advocate...learning to love and appreciate each day's blessings.

lenders.name: Sebastian
lenders.loan_because: I believe in every persons ability to change his/her life through hard work.

lenders.name: Gisle
lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician, performing electronic music and I write music for films.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea that I can help someone else with an opportunity to create or expand their business and make a decent living
lenders.occupational_info: I help nonprofit organizations make their management systems work better

lenders.loan_because:
Everything I have is on loan from God.  

Matthew 25:14-30
lenders.occupational_info: Communicator

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I love being part of a global support team!

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I know how fulfilling it can be to be your own boss, and to make your own living.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a typical corporate American office for a huge company.  I spend 40 hrs a week siting at a computer, analysing financials.

lenders.name: NANCY
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people and i believe what goes around comes around and you never know when it might be someone you love that needs a helping hand

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: No one does it alone.  We all need luck and a helping hand.  As the recipient of both, I like to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I consult with people who want to start businesses and with businesses in transition.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the saying that "If you're not outraged, then you haven't been paying attention"

lenders.name: Nicu
lenders.loan_because: I loved the idea, from the first time I heard about it and I wanted to get involved. It is we, the little people, that have the chance to prove to world that things can be changed by the power of compassion, rather then by endless politics.

lenders.name: Sonia
lenders.loan_because: I have been inpired to give to those in need. If I can touch someones life and bring positive change it is very rewarding. It is our duty to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in injury prevention and safety in a high risk sport. I help with the development of updated safety equipment ,safety training and coordinate the delivery of medical services for injured employees in the thoroughbred horse racing in California.

lenders.name: Andi
lenders.loan_because: I want to share

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's a neat idea
lenders.occupational_info: I make software to fix problems for people

lenders.name: Michelle Gervais
lenders.loan_because: I feel like one person or $25 can make all the difference in the world to someone.  I also believe that people just need a chance in life sometimes and I absolutely LOVE this organization.  God Bless you all.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a bar/restaurant in Manhattan, NY.

lenders.name: dan
lenders.loan_because: if I were in these people's positions (which any of us obviously could have been), I would hope that those more fortunate than me would be socially conscious and generous with their resources.  It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell large groups of mortgages from business to business which are securitized and sold on the US secondary market.

lenders.name: ARF
lenders.loan_because: when a single person builds a business that they value, they naturally become more interested in supporting the Rule of Law, and this benefits the entire world. This is also why I think it is better to concentrate my loans in a specific area rather than spread them over the world: when two neighboring entrepreneurs band together to support justice and law, the whole is greater than the sum of parts.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student studying electrical engineering. I hope to apply what I learn through entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Law-Nerd
lenders.loan_because: Somedays it seems as though no matter how hard I work, the judicial system is bigger than I am and wins far more often than it ought to. Since I can't always be successful, helping others keeps the balance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people  with legal problems deal with the Court system to get custody or access to their children, when divorcing or separating from their partners.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am able. I hope it is the right thing to do. Time will tell.

lenders.name: roy
lenders.loan_because: Why not?  It can only help our world community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying in IT.

lenders.name: SubhaA
lenders.loan_because: I like to see people happy
lenders.occupational_info: An enterprenuer striving to make an impact

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: interdependence is essential.

lenders.name: Kathrin and Rick
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people in developing countries to realize their dreams of becoming entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur, blessed to be born in the United States. While I am not rich with money, I have health and opportunity. When I can help others to achieve their goals, I do what I can. I admire spirit,  hard work and like to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for magazines, and I draw whenever I can. I sell my drawing, and look hard for places to sell my writing. With the internet to do business on, I don't meet the people who hire me, but I have drawn for customers all over the world. I work at what I love to do!

lenders.name: Annalise
lenders.occupational_info: I sell bonds to Institutional Investors

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great idea and am glad to help out by lending

lenders.name: mari

lenders.name: Hilary
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help others.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: When I have needed help, friends and families have been there for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I create web sites, videos, and productions that include photography, music, video and graphics.

lenders.name: Cheryl L.
lenders.loan_because: I live in America and I am blessed. This is my small way of contributing to the solution to end global poverty. I want to help others grow their own wealth so they can contribute to the planet in a positive way. Kiva makes giving fun and easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a software company as a program manager. I manage the schedules and timelines of people who invent  and design computer software for consumers.

lenders.name: Giant Cricket Farm
lenders.loan_because: I have the resources I need, and enough to share with others who are in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the operations and delivery division of our office, making sure that our customers and clients are happy with our work.  At home, I raise goats, make yarn, knit, and weave.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I think this a wonderful idea and something I can do to help other knitters and textile folks.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with women from all over the world.  While working on English and literacy, we all learn a lot from one another.

lenders.name: Penny and Brent Teem
lenders.loan_because: I want to help individuals who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a home health nurse

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I know how very blessed we are in Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children and families deal with their problems.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.occupation: Network Operations Engineer / Student of Geography

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: I feel I have had some success in my life and would like to show that capitalism works. I too have a small business and understand how difficult it can be getting started and the needs for capital to expand an existing or start-up business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved with computer and network support for the US branch of the company I work for. I also peform Quality Assurance testing for software applications for other companies. I also have a small computer and network support business on the side.

lenders.name: Avery Morrow
lenders.loan_because: If I were in their place I'd want a loan too.

lenders.name: Bubba Q
lenders.loan_because: I think if I had a chance to meet most of the poeple on the website, and they asked to borrow 25 bucks, I'd lend it to them.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach humans to stop thinking and just play with me.

lenders.name: Marcel
lenders.occupational_info: I help scientsts study how plants, animals and people work.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: I couldn't possibly have achieved what I have without the help of those more fortunate than I.  This' a chance to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: Studying Political Science and Philosophy at the University of Western Ontario.

lenders.name: Rosita
lenders.loan_because: To honour my parents who made the difficult move from Paraguay to Canada with four small children, and through their hard work raised our standard of living. I wish to help others improve their lives as well.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help each other as we are all one!

lenders.name: The Parkins
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family of three (with a baby on the way). One of us is a freelance writer, the other is a teacher and the third is only 2 and-a-half years old.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help give others a chance to achieve their dreams and goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide management consulting services to the United States government.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: "I think that it's important for every single person, no matter what they do in life, to participate in the well-being of humanity and the planet."--Selma Hayek.

lenders.name: Cesar
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in the power of entrepreneurship to empower people.  True growth comes from seeing with your own eyes what you are capable of.

In the summer of 2008 I cycled across the United States with Gabriela and we talked to people about Kiva.  People often asked us if we were riding for a cause.  Kiva became that cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I build bad-ass websites.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It's the best way to create long-term solutions to poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a bank.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: it seems like a really good way to help the glocal community
lenders.occupational_info: I work with kids in a school setting who are deemed severely emotionally disturbed

lenders.name: Meera
lenders.loan_because: I want to actively do something to change the inequalities in the world that we are confronted with everyday. I feel connected to someone far away, struggling to stand up on their own. Only wish I could do more.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books of fiction, articles and essays and teach college-my students are undergraduates and graduates.

lenders.name: Stacie
lenders.loan_because: I've been given a great deal of help in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with ancient languages (Greek and Latin) and ancient authors (Homer, Plato, Herodotus).

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.occupation: Loan Officer for a non-profit lender
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is the right thing to do and because IT WORKS!!!
lenders.occupational_info: We must all help those that are unable to help themselves.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: I was really lucky to be born in the USA.

lenders.name: steve n.
lenders.occupational_info: i solve problems

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: There is not quite enough altruism in what I do day-to-day. I feel like I am not doing enough to help.... anyone. I hope to help make a difference in people's lives, even if it is someone I may never meet.
lenders.occupational_info: Lots of typing.

lenders.name: Charlyn
lenders.loan_because: Even the smallest amount can make a world of difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mom to 2 beautiful boys.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I develop services to keep elderly and disabled people living independently in the community

lenders.name: Jim and Jean
lenders.loan_because: connecting one-to-one is the best way to provide for a life that everyone should have. I applaud those who have applied for loans and are working hard to know a fuller life.
lenders.occupational_info: Jim - a retired secondary English teacher, and Jean - a retired secondary Home economics teacher.  We both want and need to give from the abudance that life in Canada has given us.

lenders.name: Mita
lenders.loan_because: I know it can make a difference, even if small. Sometimes, that's all one needs!!
lenders.occupational_info: I started Cellucid not too long ago to provide advanced interface solutions to users of hand-held devices.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way to help others make a difference in the world ... one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Commercial Real Estate brokerage

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Everyone need a hand up sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: I build homes for families that need a safe and stable place to live and raise their families.

lenders.name: Micki
lenders.loan_because: I've got so much; there are people the world over with very little, and they're happy to have it. We should all be a little more grateful for what we have.
lenders.occupational_info: The company I work for produces polycrystalline silicon for use in solar panels and computer chips.

lenders.name: GBVC
lenders.occupational_info: GBVC is an optometric office -- we provide eye and vision care to children and adults.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you. (much love for J.C.)
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an advertising agency where I come up with ideas for video, print and the interactive world and am working on my longterm goal which is to use the power of advertising and communication for good.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: The world will be a better place if everyone in it is prosperous.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build telescopes to let us understand the universe.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a very powerful new way to support grassroots development.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach strategic management in the School of Education at the University of Pittsburgh.

lenders.name: Jim NZ
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to help people who will work hard to improve their world, even one step at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to keep the Internet running, to keep people communicating.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because: I care about helping those in need in other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my family & my home through cooking, cleaning, gardening, etc.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I believe as women, we need to support each other in times of need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife, a mother of four boys, a photographer, and a believer in the right to equality.

lenders.name: Mathew
lenders.loan_because:
I want to share what I have with People who do not have .
and to help where help is needed most.
Its always good to give
lenders.occupational_info:
I am now retired.
And now I have the time to look out and see all the hardship in the world.
And maybe in some small way I can help.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: Kiva has harnessed  technology and the heart. Who doesn't want to be able to help people move from poverty to a better way of life?
lenders.occupational_info: I work with other educators to make sure the teaching and learning environment for children is appropriate in order to prepare them for their lives as adults.  To challenge children to learn about learning and thinking creatively.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: It is a novel way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children who have been abused feel safer in the world.  I help their parents help them to feel safer in the world.

lenders.name: P&K
lenders.loan_because: We want to help make the world a better place...

lenders.name: Debbie M
lenders.loan_because:
Too often we under-estimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around. -- Dr. Felice Leonardo Buscaglia

$25 is a new pair of pants, a haircut, a dinner out or a tank of gasoline for most of us. 
But my $25+ your $25+ her $25+his $25 changes the quality of life for someone who needs a hand up! WOW! Together it takes so little to do so much!
lenders.occupational_info: Lending through KIVA gives me the satisfaction of being part of a fast growing movement to improve lives and put an end to poverty. I'm proud to be a part of the KIVA community.

lenders.name: Keri & Pete
lenders.loan_because: we want to make the world a better place...

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: i care
lenders.occupational_info: Serving food and beer to tourist to my region

lenders.name: Bastian Family
lenders.loan_because: We have been very blessed and enjoy sharing those blessings with others

lenders.name: Mario Rietveld
lenders.loan_because: My dad said it would be a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Fights crime "on the block".

lenders.name: Vanderhorst Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lenders.name: Sandy

lenders.loan_because: Such a small amount can make such a huge difference. I love that this money empowers small business owners. It's not a hand out; it's not charity. It's simply an opportunity. I also love how I can keep loaning the same money over and over again. It feels really good:)

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: As a mother I enjoy helping others to support their families, because I know how worthwhile their hard work is. When their loans are successfully repaid, they have the additional benefit of having begun the creation of a good credit history. Confidence and self respect can be built by the people who borrow, as they are able to gain more control in their lives. I am proud of the efforts they make under difficult circumstances.

lenders.name: Therese
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have lived with domestic violence. The children I work with now live at a shelter for women and children. I talk to the kids and help them get the services they need in the community.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy to help others and to just do the right thing!

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: With new loans to the USA I am devastated at what Kiva has become.
lenders.occupational_info:
.
FOLKS, KIVA IS MORALLY BANKRUPT.  

Regrettably we were not able to halt the expansion of mission which the Kiva Board has now endorsed; making loans in developed nations.  This is a sobering and heartbreaking decision.  Through Kiva’s abundant examples and words since it began operations, the Third World idealism we were led to believe was at the core of Kiva’s mission..……is not.   

Kiva is now simply a very matter-of-fact, pragmatically calculating organization which believes it can rationalize creating a level playing field for poverty in the developed nations and poverty in the Third World; an unconscionable decision.  Kiva sold its soul…to grow a lender base in the USA…and it didn’t have to.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: An Artist and a Teacher.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: it helps people better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help bring the beauty of music to the world.

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because:
I want others to work less and earn more so they have time for their faith and families! 

Its the right thing to do!

It allows people to succeed without governmental intervention!

It makes this great big world more like a community than an ant hill.

It allows all who, try, work, sweat, and brave the challenges no matter what color, race, or gender to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working for myself and know everyday how hard it is.  My hope is to help others do the same and gain back their life.
